title: New: Vessel –  Psychology Of Destructive Cult Leaders feat. Jabu
body: As far as first years go, 2012 has been a remarkable one for the 22 year old artist **[Vessel](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13756-new-vessel-scarletta-metle/ "New: Vessel – Scarletta / Metle")**. His debut LP, _Order of Nois_e, proved to be quite the critical hit when in dropped on **Triangle Records** in October. The order of noise _is_ changing; **Actress**, **Lukid** and **Hype Williams** are all proving successful, to a public that finally seems able to accept more experimental forms of electronic music. His new cut, _Psychology Of Destructive Cult Leaders_, brings these textures and ideas to the fray once more, this time with **Jabu**, a fairly unknown MC with one mind-web of a flow. The dense, industrial and challenging sounds are still present, but it now features a remarkably human touch, that the album perhaps lacked.

His debut LP, Order of Noise, proved to be quite the critical hit when in dropped on Triangle Records in October.
